name: Company Is Coming!
description:
Defend your home from zombies while also keeping it clean enough for you mother! Balance killing the zombies and defending yourself, with having to do chores such as fixing the trampled garden, the broken TV, and cleaning the blood from slain zombies.

Controls:
WASD or Arrow keys to move
Mouse aim/click to shoot
Hold left shift when near a chore to fix it

Programming/Design: James Longo
Visual Art: David Marvel
Zombie voices: Erin Cocca
Inspiration:
